sentence: One of the two hot tubs was never hot
When we were actually allowed to check in we discovered that they were cleaning the other room and there were in fact no mechanical difficulties with that room ever
The lobby pool areas restaurants etc are nice but our Deluxe King Suite was little to be desired
The security staff responded to my room one hour later my feet were killing me standing there waiting for them to arrive
So the next AM I stood in line for 20 minutes to be told they were cleaning the room we were going to and would be available in an hour
It was not until MRS MARA greatfuly helped us and moved us to a better room
They did agree to put us in yet another room our third but when we got up to the room the keys did not work
That never happened she did have someone sweep a mess of dirt mop the entire room I wanted all the linens changed they did spayed odor control to subdue the mildew smell
Rooms were very run down and the AC units leaked water creating a pool on to the tile floor
The worst part about the room the NOISE
My Wife and I stayed in one of the beach villas for a long weekend in late Feb and we could not have been happier
He was open and honest about the noise issue from the start which I appreciated very much and he upgraded us to an ocean view room
Meat market was overrated but canvas and the food at the pool bar and the room service were all great
Luckily we barely heard their noise as I was in a high enough room
Bathroom was small but very clean and great lighting
The guest are shielded from the ocean view by temporary fencing because a giant rat inflated in front of the ocean gate on the ocean side entrance

And there is a union protesting the hotel at the front entrance and on the beach which means you have people yelling singing talking through megaphones all day every day you can hear them from your rooms the pool the beach
Also the renovated rooms are a big improvement
The view was the only thing that kept us from admiring the beautiful room and its furnishings
We could walk out to the pool area and the beach from our room the kids loved it
We stayed at one of the pool side villas
The food the room the property
The hotel location is in perfect proximity to the airport but there is no airport noise in the rooms
We were treated like queens and started with drinks on the patio overlooking the pool followed by dinner at Caña Restaurant and dancing at Brava nightclub
Reserve an Ocean Villa if available great value and can not beat the views of the pool and beach
The room was spacious but housekeeping could be better because towels and waters were not replaced
I booked 2 rooms on H points for our stay
Views from an UPgraded polside villa are of a construction site
The next day we changed rooms
Everything else is top notch including the food we had from room service twice

Not only excellent location but this hotel and staff is going all the way on customer satisfaction a true icon is back from the front desk valet parking room service and restaurant staff they went all the way
The rooms are standard but nice and great views
And stayed in the hot tub until it closed at night
There are two good sized pools with hot tubs and servers to come around and take drink food orders although the old hotel pool is still fenced off and in need of renovation
It was so easy to go from our room to the pool to the beach to the restaurants
The lady that arrived gave me my room key i checked in online
Well appointed guest rooms
The pools there are 3 have a hot tub and a swim up bar
Great views and easy access to the beach
This hotel is first rate from the beautifully appointed lobby to the ocean view rooms choice of four pools spacious beach and valet service
Two outdoor hot tubs
Shower was amazing as welThere are 4 pools and it ’s easy to move around to different loungers during the day
Just newly renovated the hotel rooms are brand new several pools restaurants and beach lounge service which was great
Rooms Offered by the Hotel Ocean View
He was amazing very nice and kept the room clean and we always had enough coffee
Room service was all that was available and it took 3 hours to get anything sent up
